name: Spicy Cheddar Cheese Ball
description: A guaranteed crowd-pleaser. Delicious served with Red Pepper Jelly.

ingredients.name: sliced almonds or pecan, or walnut crumbs

preparation: Combine cream cheese, cheddar, Worcestershire sauce and sriracha seasoning.

If adding a pinot noir jelly filling, refrigerate until firm, 20–30 minutes. Cut ball in half. Using your finger, make a hollow in centre of each half. Fill hollows with pinot noir jelly. Carefully press halves together and reshape into a ball.
tips: Cheese balls can be frozen for up to 1 month. Unwrap and thaw to room temperature before serving with crackers or bread.
